line.comment: * Commented out: always sell or unload, no matter if the import threshold has changed.
* if [THIS]-> is script 'Mayhem.Cmd.Worker.Trader' on stack of task=0
* skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsImportable' : station=[DOCKEDAT] ware=$ware
* skip if [DOCKEDAT]-> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay
* skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsImportable' : station=[DOCKEDAT] ware=$ware
* removed in Zero Hour 1.4: NPCs no longer check player prices and just sell if they came to you in the first place. Most players never use prices or even understand them.
* We first reset what we've previously added.

line.text: ' but the station doesn't have enough money.'
' because the price was too low.'
